name: T3D
description:
T3D is a multiplayer first-person shooter with tight controls and even tighter aiming.

Practice your aim and movement with projectile and hitscan weapons!

HOW TO HOST A GAME:

To host a game, you must run the game, click host, and port forward port 8888 for the machine you host it on. Google "How to port forward" if you need help.

HOW TO JOIN A GAME:

Ask your friend who is hosting a game for their IP address. Enter it before you join the game.
